title: Thystorye of the right noble and worthy knyght parys and of the fayre vyenne the dolphyns doughter of vyennoys
author: Pierre, de la Cépède, 15th cent.
publicationStmtDate: in the yere of our lord. M.cccc. fowre skore and twelve [1492]: a[n]d fynysshed the xxiij. day of Iuyne]
